278e077a0cc3.title: I am truly sick and disgusted with the entire trump/kushner clans.

paragraphs.name: 84e3
paragraphs.text: I am truly sick and disgusted with the entire trump/kushner clans. They are profiting off of the office of the Presidency and the type of legislation they support, as shown by the healthcare debacle, shows their true hand. The income divide will worsen under these unethical people, and in the long run, America will continue to lose. We are already losing our standing as leader of the free world.

Harry Reid left a millionaire. Ted Kennedy just happened to buy a block in D.C. on the cheap. Fortunate for him. It just happened to be where the underground was going to build a major station. Feinstein and her husband made millions off a deal with the government in an area his company had no history. Yeah, but that Trump.

paragraphs.text: His sons are in charge of his businesses. Not him. He is making no money off anything.

So what if Eric Trump recently said that he is in regular contact with his father and will update him quarterly on the financial performance of his companies. That does not mean that he is running it.
